statements: SELECT * FROM credit_score_changes
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_score_changes ORDER BY credit_score DESC
SELECT id, customer_id, credit_score, change_date FROM credit_score_changes WHERE credit_score > 700
SELECT customer_id, reason FROM credit_score_changes WHERE reason LIKE '%late payment%'
SELECT id, customer_id, change_date FROM credit_score_changes WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT id, customer_id, credit_score, change_date, reason FROM credit_score_changes WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY change_date DESC
SELECT * FROM credit_score_changes WHERE credit_score > 700 AND reason LIKE '%late payment%'
SELECT customer_id, AVG(credit_score) AS average_score FROM credit_score_changes GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(credit_score) > 650
SELECT id, MAX(credit_score) AS max_score FROM credit_score_changes WHERE change_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY id
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS change_count FROM credit_score_changes GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 3 ORDER BY change_count DESC
SELECT user_id, score, date FROM credit_scores WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, old_score, new_score, timestamp FROM credit_score_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM credit_scores;
SELECT user_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM credit_scores GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, score, date FROM credit_scores WHERE score > 700 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, old_score, new_score, timestamp FROM credit_score_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, score, date FROM credit_scores WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, old_score, new_score, timestamp FROM credit_score_logs WHERE change_log LIKE '%increase%' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, old_score, new_score, timestamp FROM credit_score_logs WHERE old_score < new_score;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores;
SELECT user_id, score, change_date FROM credit_scores ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, improvement_date, new_score FROM score_improvements WHERE new_score > 800;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE score > 700 ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, score FROM users INNER JOIN credit_scores ON users.user_id = credit_scores.user_id WHERE score < 500;
SELECT user_id, MAX(new_score) AS highest_score FROM score_improvements GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT user_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM credit_scores GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, date FROM credit_history ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM credit_agencies;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, credit_score FROM customers JOIN credit_history ON customers.customer_id = credit_history.customer_id;
SELECT MAX(credit_score) AS max_credit_score FROM credit_history;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT name, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, user_id, report_date FROM CreditReport ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, credit_limit FROM CreditLimit WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT * FROM CreditScoreHistory WHERE user_id = 2 AND credit_score < 600 ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CreditScoreHistory ORDER BY change_date DESC, credit_score ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_text FROM CreditReport WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditInquiry WHERE inquiry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, credit_limit FROM CreditLimit WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
